\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{\cdots } \& {X_3} \& {X_2} \& {X_1} \& {X_0} \\
	{\cdots } \& {\mathrm{im}(\psi _{\infty, 3})} \& {\mathrm{im}(\psi _{\infty, 2})} \& {\mathrm{im}(\psi _{\infty, 1})} \& {\mathrm{im}(\psi _{\infty, 0})}
	\arrow["{\psi _{3,4}}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\psi _{2,3}}", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\psi _{1,2}}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{\psi _{0,1}}", from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-2, to=1-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-4, to=1-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-5, to=1-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
